Added the Layer Editor tool.
Fixed layer editor duplicating layers in the search box, crashing the browser after a while. Affected characters such as 2B YoRHa Uniform 1, Snow White, Naga Last Girlhood, ...
Expanded the color slider from 0..255 to 0..510 to allow over-saturation of colors. Meaning it's possible to white wash clothes or characters. It still has it's limits.
Refactored some code to avoid insanely recursive methods on the layer editor lol.
Added an export and import feature to the layer editor. Does NOT work for custom imported animations. Can break when a character gets updated with new animations.
